content:
As discussed in today's meeting, we will be moving from synchronous updates in the monthly meeting to asynchronous monthly subgroup updates via Zulip. Co-chairs for each subgroup will be asked to write up an update each month and send it in this channel with information about activity in their subgroup for that month with links to PRs/issues and context as needed.

Open question: should we create a new topic in the channel every month with the month/year in the name or use a singular continuous update topic?
